chunks.text:
From: Chris Matsumoto <Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com> 
Sent: Tuesday, 20 May 2025 3:14 PM
To: Rawad Hossein <Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>; Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>; Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>; Philip Abdou <Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com>; Muhammed Sweadan <Muhammed.Sweadan@chalhoub.com>; Romy Ammar <Romy.Ammar@chalhoub.com>; Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
Cc: Eric Vergnes <Eric.Vergnes@chalhoub.com>
Subject: Urgent Event Planning: De Beers cocktail in Bab Al Shams hotel - Russian VIP 
Importance: High

 

Dear All,

 

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Kindly note, we will be hosting a birthday celebration for a VIP Russian HNWI in Bab Al Shams Desert hotel on Thursday May 22nd.

 

The aim of this event is to incorporate De Beers in the Dubai HWNI Russian network.

 

Please note the following details:

 

Total Guests expected: 30

Total Amount of Chalhoub De Beers staff on-site: 4

 

6 High Jewellery sets will be on-site in 6 locked vitrine showcases

3 fine jewellery sets will be on-site for clients to try on: Always with De Beers Client Advisors and Security

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 

Total Expected Value of pieces on-site AED 9.5 million (We will provide you the full confirmed list by tonight)

 

@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> 

Jewellery to be picked-up by TG team in De Beers Dubai Mall at 2pm on May 22nd

metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\CKZ4MPK - urgent event planning de beers cocktail in bab al shams hotel - russian vip\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Total Expected Value of pieces on-site AED 9.5 million (We will provide you the full confirmed list by tonight)

 

@Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> 

Jewellery to be picked-up by TG team in De Beers Dubai Mall at 2pm on May 22nd

Jewellery to be picked-up by TG Team at Bab El Shams Hotel at 9pm on May 22nd , kept overnight in TG vault and delivered back to De Beers Dubai Mall at 8am on May 23rd

One Security Guard to be scheduled to be on-site from 3pm until 9pm on May 22nd

 

 

We appreciate your help and support to make this last-minute request a success !

 

Please feel free to contact me should you require any further details.

 

Best regards,

 

Chris Matsumoto

 



Dubai Mall - Grand Atrium

Ground Floor, Unit 271

T: + 971 4 271 9838

Mobile: +971 50 694 4965

debeers.dubaimall@chalhoub.com <mailto:debeers.dubaimall@chalhoub.com> 

 


--------------------------------------------------

The aim of this event is to incorporate De Beers in the Dubai HWNI Russian network.

 

Please note the following details:

 

Total Guests expected: 30

Total Amount of Chalhoub De Beers staff on-site: 4

 

6 High Jewellery sets will be on-site in 6 locked vitrine showcases

3 fine jewellery sets will be on-site for clients to try on: Always with De Beers Client Advisors and Security

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>

From: Chris Matsumoto <Chris.Matsumoto@chalhoub.com>
Sent: Tuesday, 20 May 2025 4:42 PM
To: Rami Riman <Rami.Riman@chalhoub.com>; Ahmed Eltahan <Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com>

Subject: RE: Urgent Event Planning: De Beers cocktail in Bab Al Shams hotel - Russian VIP 
 

Hi Rami,

 

Thank you for these clarifications.

 

Kindly find below our TG feedback after our opening event in April:

 

1.	what went well: 

Pick-up from the store and delivery was on time, same for the pick-up from the hotel. Calling us 1 hour before TG show-up in order to have everything packed and ready.

2.	what didn’t go well: 

During the pick-up from the hotel back to the boutique, the TG team came with only one rolling suitcase that did not fit all the pieces with the original packaging. We had to re-pack the pieces to make them all fit 

3.	what to avoid in the coming events : 

Come prepared with 2 suitcases or one extra-large suitcase to fit all items

4.	etc...

Nothing to report

Best regards,

 

Chris Matsumoto

 



Dubai Mall - Grand Atrium

Ground Floor, Unit 271

T: + 971 4 271 9838

debeers.dubaimall@chalhoub.com <mailto:debeers.dubaimall@chalhoub.com>
